member.name: F:DG.Debugging.Verbosity.Normal
member.summary: Log everything except logs marked as verbose

member.name: T:DG.Debugging.Delogger
member.summary: Logs messages using the given options

member.name: F:DG.Debugging.Delogger.verbosity
member.summary: Sets the runtime verbosity value, which indicates the type of messages that will be logged

member.name: F:DG.Debugging.Delogger.editorVerbosity
member.summary: Sets the editor verbosity value, which indicates the type of messages that will be logged

member.name: F:DG.Debugging.Delogger.enabled
member.summary: If FALSE doesn't log anything, neither in editor nor at runtime
